pr_title: Fix javadoc and parameter name and add warning to FHIRUtil.getRandomKey

timeline.bodyText: I know it's not related to this change, but why are we seeding here? Potential OWASP because currentTimeMillis isn't sufficiently random.
timeline.author: punktilious

replies.bodyText: I was wondering the same thing, which is why i added the warning...i'm not even sure it should fallback to SecureRandom
replies.author: lmsurpre

replies.bodyText: I don't think this should be in FHIRUtil -- it should go into bulkdata, and be hidden away.
replies.author: prb112

timeline.message:
Fix javadoc and parameter name and add warning to FHIRUtil.getRandomKey

Signed-off-by: Lee Surprenant <lmsurpre@us.ibm.com>

Fix javadoc and parameter name and add warning to FHIRUtil.getRandomKey
